title: Consistency next hurdle as IU heads to Penn State
text:
Chris Howell Consistency next hurdle for the Hoosiers 
Chris Howell | Herald-TimesIndiana coach Kevin Wilson congratulates his defense on stopping Ohio State on a third down during last Saturday’s game at Memorial Stadium. Posted: Saturday, October 10, 2015 12:56 am 
After years of toiling at Indiana football’s perpetual rebuilding project, Kevin Wilson’s work is beginning to yield affirmation.
